title: Diablo I - BNet Edition
description:
Diablo - BNet Edition
---------------------

SUMMARY
Diablo I is a classic game which hasnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t transitioned well to newer versions of Windows. Refusing to let Diablo die, hackers have resolved many graphic and networking incompatibilities. This release seeks to continue their work; packaging tweaks and hacks in a clean format. While functionality has been restored mechanics and content remain unaltered. This edition feels and plays just like Diablo did in 1997.

INSTRUCTIONS
Download and double-click.

NETWORKING
This edition supports the following three methods of online play:
[Pseudo-IPX ] To use this method all players must be connected though a LAN or VLAN and UDP port 54792 should be forwarded
[LAN ] To use this method all players must be connected through a LAN or VLAN and UDP port 6112 should be forwarded.
[Battle.net] To use this method all players must be connected to the Internet and UDP ports 6112-6119 should be forwarded.

BASE GAME
Diablo 1 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Version 1.09

HACKS/TWEAKS
[-] Diablo has been bundled into a single self-contained binary.
[-] No CD is required. As a side effect, size has been dramatically reduced.
[-] Washed out and rainbow colors no longer occur.
[-] All methods of online play have been restored.
[-] All saved games are now located in a folder on the userÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s desktop.
[-] Many moreÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

REMAINING BUGS
[ ] The opening cinematic does not scale correctly.
[ ] This edition relies on a hidden batch script for automation, which may be falsely flagged as a virus. The script can be found in %APPDATA%DiabloScript .

SPECIAL THANKS
Special thanks is owed to the hackers whose work was Ã¢â‚¬â€œdirectly or indirectlyÃ¢â‚¬â€œ incorporated into the BNet Edition. They are Zamal, Zenda, Crystallion, Moe St Evergreen, Marsh, Noktis, Chochlik and Strange Bytes
